amendatorysection.catchline: Investigation by Secretary of State for collection purposes; duty of county clerk.
amendatorysection.para: Any county clerk shall, upon request of the Secretary of State, furnish him or her with such information as is shown by the records of his or her office concerning corporations located within his or her county and subject to sections 21-301 to 21-325. The Secretary of State, or any person deputized by him or her for the purpose of determining the amount of fees due from such corporation, shall have authority to investigate and determine the facts showing the proportion of the paid-up capital stock of the company represented by its property and business in Nebraska.
